data.title: Minnesota Timberwolves Roster
data.meta_description: Minnesota Timberwolves scores, news, schedule, players, stats, rumors, depth charts and more on RealGM.com
data.text:
Wayne Ellington was selected as the #28 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Wayne Ellington signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 9, 2009.

Jonny Flynn was selected as the #6 pick in the First Round of the 2009 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Jonny Flynn signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 9, 2009.

Wesley Johnson was selected as the #4 pick in the First Round of the 2010 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Wesley Johnson signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 12, 2010.

Nikola Pekovic was selected as the #1 pick in the Second Round of the 2008 NBA Draft by the Minnesota Timberwolves. Nikola Pekovic signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on August 23, 2010.

Draft Rights to Lazar Hayward, the #30 pick in the First Round of the 2010 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Washington Wizards on June 24, 2010. Lazar Hayward signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 12, 2010.

Draft Rights to Kevin Love, the #5 pick in the First Round of the 2008 NBA Draft, were acquired by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Memphis Grizzlies on June 26, 2008. Kevin Love signed a multi-year contract with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 10, 2008.

Michael Beasley was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Miami Heat on July 12, 2010.

Darko Milicic was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the New York Knicks on February 17, 2010. Darko Milicic re-signed to a multi-year contract as a free agent with the Minnesota Timberwolves on July 12, 2010.

Anthony Randolph was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the New York Knicks on February 22, 2011.

Sebastian Telfair was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Cleveland Cavaliers on July 26, 2010.

Martell Webster was acquired in a trade by the Minnesota Timberwolves from the Portland Trail Blazers on June 24, 2010.
